name: Swarm (itch) (DerKuchen)
description:
SWARM

A game for Ludum Dare 46: Keep it alive.

Try to keep your swarm alive while navigating through increasingly difficult levels.

Tested with Firefox and Chrome on Windows and Android.
Source code: https://gitlab.com/jkuechler/ld46

Made with Godot.
Font by Kenney.nl.
Sound effects made with sfxr.
